website_summaries.verdict: As far as ice-powered cooling units go, this is one of the more powerful models available.
pros: With its 6-liter water tank and a powerful fan, this cooling unit can reduce the temperature of small rooms quickly
Convenient wheeled design makes it easy to reposition
Very quiet operation and a built-in timer setting
cons: Not a true air conditioner as it requires ice or water

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting something that would be cooler than a normal desk fan that I was previously using. Not at all cooler even with the "cooling" function and considerably noisier than the normal fan. For those looking for a cheaper alternative to an air conditioner would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Tad Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Sooo worth the money!!! AAAA+++++
customer_reviews.text: Wow what can I say, have had this on for an hour and the whole room is cooled down nicely already, without the ice packs!! My room is 15ft by 15ft the Igenix does not even need to be by you to feel the cool air on these hot days! 2 year warranty to!! Wish I would of bought sooner!!!!
customer_reviews.author: mary kay

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition
customer_reviews.text: So glad a brought this cooler. My fan just wasn’t quite doing it. It produces a lovely breeze with just the fans on, when you put ice and cool blocks in it you can feel the difference with the breeze that touches you but doesn’t cool down a whole room. So if your looking to buy it as an air con unit this is the wrong thing to go for. If your looking to buy it as a much better fan with good cooking options this is the one
customer_reviews.author: Zoe Quail

customer_reviews.title: Not an air conditioner but worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Overall this is good for the price. Pros: easy to use, portable, small, looks good, effective when filled with ice/iced water, not too noisy, has a timer, easy to clean, no smells. Cons: requires a lot of ‘faff’ to get the maximum benefit. Plenty of ice needed plus cool packs and refrigerated water. Gives about 2 hours of cold air. Doesn’t cool the room, have to point it towards you. That said, this has been an absolute god-send in the current heatwave so I have no problem recommending it.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Big mistake, horrible product, avoid!
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the worst purchase I have ever made. 1 month into usage, and it barely does anything at all. I poured ice-cold water and added ice, yet the air still comes out at room temperature. It is noisy as if you were on a plane, seated just by the engine. Unbelievable! It fails to do its only task- which is to cool the air. Honestly, a £15 desk fan does a better job than this useless noise generator.
customer_reviews.author: Lev P.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Bough this item. Makes absolutely no difference unless you glue yourself to it. Does not cool the room. I can not believe they are allowed to sell it as air cooler... this is in the category ''worse than fan''...
customer_reviews.author: Radostina Georgieva

customer_reviews.title: Great and helpful.
customer_reviews.text: Although is noisy it does cool down in the hot heat loft conversion room. You can definitely feel cooling the room down with the water that it uses. A must have I will say! Go for it you won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for one hour
customer_reviews.text: The unit stopped working after one hour. the power light all stay on but nothing comes out. There's no seller to contact for help or support the only option is to return it and now I have to pay the very expensive cost of the postage.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie J.

customer_reviews.title: It's a pretty good fan, but that's pretty much all it is.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a middle ground between a fan and air conditioning. Unfortunately, it serves as nought more than a fan that can make my room slightly more damp. Don't get me wrong. It's a very good fan, but even having it directed directly at you doesn't quite work as you would expect it to, when the tank is filled with cold water, that is. A good buy if you need a humidifer and a fan in one, not a good buy if you need something to keep you extra cool.
customer_reviews.author: Luis McNair

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: It just doesn't cool the air , in fact it made the room warmer
customer_reviews.author: A Crucefix

customer_reviews.title: very efficient at cooling rooms. Great cooling unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great alternative to an air conditioning unit with tube and gas powered. This unit is robust, modern and pumps out cool air even before putting the water powered cooling on. You place an ice pack(2x supplied) in the water tank and this allows cool air water vapour to release into the room allowing a super cool breeze to spread in warm rooms. Oscillating options is great added bonus. Highly recommended product
customer_reviews.author: Philip M

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: I've brought 2 off these for bedrooms. Very easy to use. Fill water up. Not only that, you can set the timer. So no need to worry about water running out. I like the noise, in back ground, but some people will beg to differ. Very easy to move around. You have to remember the is not a air con cooling machine. It does the job for me and my family. You will notice the difference when you fill it with water. It's definitely cooler. This product is well made, and looks good. Very tidy and slim line. Compared to air con machines. So good luck. Hope this helps you decide.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant cooler, easy to use, very happy!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant product, really happy, does exactly what it says on the box. Will cool down anywhere its facing quickly and efficiently. Going to be ideal when the UK hits 40° like last year! Read the negative reviews with a pinch of salt, definitely worth the cash. Plugs straight into the mains, fill the tank up with water, add in ice blocks and you have chilled air.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: All in all, wouldn’t recommend buying this product for this price.
customer_reviews.text: Not better than having a fan, adding ice cubes make some difference but not a lot. The fan is not powerful enough so not enough breeze , a standard tower fan I own has more breeze than this one. Also quite big ( I understand I have read the dimensions) , especially with a warmer added to it. Not sure if adding warmer is causing less air flow in the room. It is big but short, so the breeze doesn’t reach when you are sleeping on a bed. All in all, wouldn’t recommend buying this product for this price , two tower fans would do a better job.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product for keeping cool
customer_reviews.text: We have this in our living room, though it can be wheeled into any room. It's light and easy to manoeuvre. Just watch if you have water inside. The remote is handy as you can turn it on or off when you choose without getting up. The fan is powerful enough for us and cools the room straightaway. The water reservoir is hidden at the back and seems watertight. I would recommend this product to anyone looking to purchase a cooler/fan.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lesley Hedger

customer_reviews.title: Reasonable value - basic but looks good and works as can be expected for the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and reasonably compact it you plan the storage by its dimensions before purchase. Cooling - for the money it's fine but struggles when really hot. You have to keep plying it with ice blocks or from trays when excessively hot (30+c) and periodically recycle the cold tap water from the fridge if the ice runs out. The water tray plug is easy enough to use and re-secure as long as you have the necessary flat item to drain the water into as the tray does not detach. Have yet to try the heater which will be its second purpose in life.
customer_reviews.author: M J.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Could not live without this. I suffer migraines and this really helps me. Also i get so hot even in winter so used a lot . It really keeps me cool.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Howe

customer_reviews.title: Noisy and Not so effective
customer_reviews.text: Style Name: Without Heating Function There was a sudden heat wave, and thought we really need something like this. However something is leaking and it’s very noisy overall all. I wouldn’t recommend it, pretty bulky and heavy to move. Remote Control works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Haider

customer_reviews.title: Fan has stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Hi, this fan has suddenly stopped working. It does not switch on at all. It should still be covered under warranty. Can you please contact me to send a replacement or repair or refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this item. Exactly how it was described. Easy to move around on all types of flooring and the noise level is good, it's not really loud but when using higher settings you do realise that you have it on. Ideal for under a desk or in a corner as the item is narrow and doesn't take up massive amount of room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective with water dripping profusely from day 1
customer_reviews.text: Waste of £100. It leaks profusely and has ruined my wooden flooring which has now warped. It leaked on day one (so was obviously a design flaw and nothing to do with the filters) and has got progressively worse in the three weeks since I bought it. It actually drips from the unit which is very dangerous for an electrical appliance. Such a massive waste of money :(
customer_reviews.author: DannyMac

customer_reviews.title: Read before buying
customer_reviews.text: I was under no allusion when purchasing this that it was not an ac unit. However I did think it would be better than a fan, but it’s not. The water runs out quite quickly. You have to be on top of it to feel anything. It makes no difference to the room I’m in at the time and that’s keeping the door closed and using lots of ice and cold water. In fact I feel it’s cooler when I leave the room! Total waste of money as far as I’m concerned. Will put away for the winter. Hopefully the heater is better
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good product
customer_reviews.text: Great device however mine broke after two days of having it... the seller replaced it within 24 hours so I'm very happy
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. Ivancik

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably quiet, with nice cool air
customer_reviews.text: Cheap for what you get! It’s not an air conditioner, so don’t expect ice cold air, we use the ice blocks in with the water. It’s really good for blowing out lovely cool/ cold air around the room, we use it to keep the dog cool in the summer, we have had ours since last summer and is still going well
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. J. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Remote a boon at night!
customer_reviews.text: Used this last summer during all the very hot weather and found it helpful particularly at night. Water lasted for several hours when filled to max. Does obviously make a noise but I did not find it kept me awake. Loved the remote so I can turn off and on when in bed!
customer_reviews.author: sleepy hollow

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ineffective. Adds a lot of mositure to the room and thus makes the heat more unbearable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT HAPPY
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in January only just needed to use it and it leaks cannot use it for intended purpose and I am gutted it’s gone past the Amazon 30 day return. Whatever you do try it out straight away please don’t do what I have done.
customer_reviews.author: Gazzer 66

customer_reviews.title: This is pointless in the summer
customer_reviews.text: You have to constantly feed it ice cubes to keep water in the storage compartment cool. There are cool blocks but they melt quickly in hot weather. All in all a bit of a waste of money. It does have a humidifier aspect which helps I suppose, but do wish i'd spent a bit more and got a proper air con unit.
customer_reviews.author: Marva Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: After a shaky start with delivery which was due to the carrier, I received my items promptly after intervention of seller. The coolers seem quite robust and noise level is good. Haven't been able to use them yet in hot weather to see how efficient they are. I do like the fact they have timer and remote control option. Also the fact that ice blocks are Included so you can cool the air down. Looking forward to using them if the hot weather strikes again this summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hot News!
customer_reviews.text: The unit helped us through a period of plus 40 degree temperatures in France recently. Although not a substitute for air conditioning it did provide a steady stream of cooler air both night and day and at a fraction of the cost of an ac unit. It can be a fiddle to change the ice packs in the unit and it’s not the quietest machine. Nevertheless the cooler airstream was welcome and overall the unit worked well.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Stackhouse

customer_reviews.title: Great piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the heat wave. Has been used non stop, without any problems. Its portability and quiet operation means it can be easily moved from lounge to bedroom if required. In short, a great purchase
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Longmuir

customer_reviews.title: It... helps, but don't expect miracle
customer_reviews.text: It helps cool down the room by probably 1, at most 2 C... feel better if sitting right in front of it. It cannot cool down a 4m x 4m room. Go for proper aircon if cost is not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Penny Wood

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Piece Of kit
customer_reviews.text: I was a little sceptical when I ordered this, I read the reviews and went for it. I really was amazed how good it is. It is light, manouverable and works superbly. It keeps a room very cool and fresh. I would highly recommend this fan
customer_reviews.author: Mr. I. P. Bass

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant.
customer_reviews.text: I had an air cooler that I bought 3 years ago, but this is so much better. Soon after getting the first I bought another. Well worth the money; very effective at keeping the temperature pleasant on days that are too hot for me. I recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Trisha

customer_reviews.title: It does work
customer_reviews.text: Cools and it helps you sleep on them hot sweaty nights - we place the unit at the end of the bed, yes it is slightly noisy but it’s better than being hot and can’t sleep and a lot cheaper than fitting a AC system! We’ve even used it in the man cave and even the neighbours said it differently helps Place it on timer - make sure the Water in cold before putting the 3 ice blocks in and it will keep you cool for a couple of hours.
customer_reviews.author: Adey Pep

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t cool the room down. But good fan
customer_reviews.text: The item itself was well built and it blows out cool air if the water tank is filled with ice and the ice packs provided. Unfortunately it doesn’t cool down the room. As someone with a room that gets ridiculously hot it didn’t do much for me unfortunately. However the fan is great and a lot quieter than a standard fan.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for me
customer_reviews.text: Cant say it chilled our room, but if directed towards you kept you chilled! Quite fussy machine every thing has to be closed / pushed in properly or will not function correctly. Water container easily takes ice cubes/ freezer packs ( 2 supplied with machine) Overall very happy with machine.
customer_reviews.author: gravedeeds

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money👍
customer_reviews.text: This works really well if you are sat infront of it, works ok as a room cooler in general. It is a little unstable on carpet when moving as the wheels are small but that doesn't detract from the fact it is easy to move. Overall it works fantastic and is a fantastic device to have on a hot night to help you get to sleep👍
customer_reviews.author: Cpj uk

customer_reviews.title: It's good at doing what it is suppose too.
customer_reviews.text: The air that comes out is v v cold. I bought to use in my gym, knowing that I would have to wheel it along behind me. And does give a cold refreshing blow ;-). I also have a large floor fan which I use at the same time as this unit. The fan then puts more power behind the v v cold air and helps to cool me when the room is exceeding 25c. As others have said it cools the area directly Infront of the unit not the room itself. But is instantly cold.
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: Returned as not fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: I have returned this the following day as it not cool at all, fan does a better job on my opinion. I expected much more. Just want to add that Amazon customer service is amazing though, easiest return and refund ever
customer_reviews.author: fab81

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: It’s only been 1 week but very good so far! Not too noisy as some said. One advise: Amazon will suggest ice packed with it. Don’t buy them till u receive the cooler itself. The ones Amazon suggest do not fit the cooler itself !
customer_reviews.author: Souma

customer_reviews.title: Better than a normal fan! But no AC alternative!
customer_reviews.text: This has the potential to be a good product however the water tank has leaked from day one if we use the ‘humidification’ function. It’s basically slightly better than a normal fan as the air is cooler especially when being used in a heatwave in London! Noise wise it’s probably as loud as a normal fan so if you can sleep through that you can sleep through this. Looks pretty smart and is easy enough to move around. Don’t buy as an alternative to an AC unit as it will not cool a room.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha S

customer_reviews.title: Superb air cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb air cooler, not too noisy and easily manoeuvrable. The remote control is easy to use, and the fact that one can set it to function for a fixed time is splendid, especially at night if the air is humid and hot. We can really recommend this unit, which is much cheaper than true air conditioner units, and doesn't need an extractor hose.
customer_reviews.author: Dr JF

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing! Did not cool the room
customer_reviews.text: Quiet, easy to move around and easy to operate using remote however it did not sufficiently cool even the smallest of rooms and left spaces smelly damp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its chinese but its actually really good
customer_reviews.text: Its chinese but its actually really good love filling this up with ice it makes the room so cool and likewise full it up with warm water and it makes the room warmer like a heater
customer_reviews.author: Halzar

customer_reviews.title: Water leak
customer_reviews.text: First night using the water feature in the kids room as it’s 30c. Been on for a hour I come up to check everything is ok and there carpet is soaked. Somehow water is dripping out of the front of the cooler between the joins by the front wheel. Needless to say my happy
customer_reviews.author: joe clark

customer_reviews.title: Good but Smelly!
customer_reviews.text: I think this works really well and is great value for money. It’s important to note as other reviewers have mentioned this is a cooler, not an air conditioner. However the biggest problem with this product is that it can get really smelly!!! I forgot to throw out the water for a month and it became really slimey. Since then everytime I use the cooler it gives off a foul odour like a a fish tank. I replaced the honey comb filter and it was fine for a few uses but the slimey smell came back. That’s a no go for me. Will be throwing this out.
customer_reviews.author: KUttam

customer_reviews.title: Portable Air Cooler.
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t sure what to expect when deciding wether to order or not, because we ordered through Amazon we felt like we had a good return policy in place, I can say we are delighted with the Air cooler, for the price I don’t think you could purchase better.
customer_reviews.author: Barney

customer_reviews.title: Don’t trust the customer reviews on this item
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item based on customer reviews which was very good! Unfortunately, the air cooler is not cooler than a fan. Its not effective at hot weather at all even for s small room. Dont waste your money. I am still waiting to return it!
customer_reviews.author: Simm

customer_reviews.title: Slightly under powered cooler
customer_reviews.text: Despite the humidifier element, this still dries you out over a night’s sleep. Whilst the air is marginally cooler, the unit isn’t really powerful enough to have the effect of a decent room fan, with cooling. It appears to drop my bedroom temperature a couple of degrees, however; when that’s from 23-21°C, it doesn’t feel like it quite has enough punch. I know it’s not A/C but I was buying it for the cooling effect only.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of theses machines, my wife loves the noise it makes, very low and soothing. One of the machine was missing a small filter in the water tank, I contacted the sell who apologised and without question dispatched a replacement, this arrived within a couple of days with an apology. Great customer service, would recommend the Cooler and the company to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect air cooler
customer_reviews.text: Amazing fan, only an air cooler but it states that in the name, it blows cool air and does a good job at it. Fill the tank with water and put one of the ice blocks of the two supplied in and it keeps us nice and cool. Tank of water lasts about 6 hours and when the water runs out it still blows cold enough. Zero complaints kept us cool through the hot weather in what was an unbearably hot bedroom. Don't know what the bad reviews are for.
customer_reviews.author: A. Person

customer_reviews.title: NOISY!
customer_reviews.text: This is one noisy fan. Even at its lowest power setting it still is noisy to the point where we cannot sleep, and thus have to turn it off. It cools bedrooms well although we use it without the water and ice-packs. The length of the cord is short so limited movement; wheels make it easy to pivot/rotate. It's also very light-weight anyways. If we knew about the noise, we wouldn't have bought it, so if you are a light-sleeper and want this on when you sleep, look for a less noisy option.
customer_reviews.author: Fatma T.

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth The money.
customer_reviews.text: This air cooler, is absolutely brill. We had it on 24/7 day & night It's really lovely, easy to move & you can pick it up, or push it from room to room. You just fill it with water, then it on & that's it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerJackie W.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet, light, easy to use, great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant cooler. Don’t bother with the ice packs or even water function, just use the fan settings for lovely cold air. Cools the room in only a few minutes. Great product and great value for money.
customer_reviews.author: D. J. BLOXSOME-GARRIDO

customer_reviews.title: Better than a fan!
customer_reviews.text: This air cooler has seamlessly cooled down the temperature of the room and made it easier to sleep using just cold water. I presume that once we introduce the included ice packs the temperature will reduce even more A+++.
customer_reviews.author: JoeD

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Very good Air cooler. The air flow is amazing really strong. The coldness of the Air is brilliant compared to other coolers. Definitely worth the money especially with the discount in the item. That’s what sold it for me. Would of never of bought it for £200 as I’m quite tight with money. Best purchase for the long while!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worst ever product !
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst purchases I ever had ! You have to glue yourself to it to feel anything! This is after spending few weeks in hope that I was missing something! NOT RECOMMENDED AT ALL !
customer_reviews.author: Khalid Rehman

customer_reviews.title: Very costly for little real effect
customer_reviews.text: You need to keep it filled up with very cold water and ice blocks in order to get about 2c cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Good cooling effect.
customer_reviews.text: A good overall purchase, perfect for warm days and nights. We got it in our bedroom and it has brought us relief in the heat. Makes a humming noise which gets a bit louder when on higher speed. We are happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: deepti

customer_reviews.title: Worst prod ever
customer_reviews.text: Got this last summer and I was very disappointed. Even if you add The ice packs and extra Ice it won’t make any difference. A normal fan makes the job 5 times better. I’ve got this in the bedroom and you have to literally keep it next to bed and barely barely feel a little “ wind” coming from it near to you’re feet’s , it won’t come near to you’re face never it doesn’t have the strength. Worst product ever. Useless!
customer_reviews.author: Madalina C.

customer_reviews.title: Good value full room cooler
customer_reviews.text: Good value full room cooler, works well as a chiller when filling the water tray (evaporation cooling) the remotes a nice touch but is small enough to keep getting lost - Would benifit from a holder on the unit - we just used velcro stick on pads other wise it would be constantly lost,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ineffective in hot weather
customer_reviews.text: The product added humidity to already-hot air which made the environment feel sticky. It was ineffective in temperatures over 30 degrees. The coating on the honeycomb filter leaked into the water tank, causing yellow droplets to stick to the inside of the tank and turning the water cloudy and smelly. It became clear that this problem would eventually clog up the entire system. Not happy at all with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Stewart

customer_reviews.title: It blows cold air, like an air con unit
customer_reviews.text: When filled with ice cold water the air expelled is nice and cool. You can feel the benefit on a hot day. Does it cool the room not sure, hence dropped star. (though we do have a big room). As a fan that feels cold, worth the money for those few super hot nights.
customer_reviews.author: Simon Alderson

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt cool air much
customer_reviews.text: Water, icepacks even ice cubes in the water makes little difference to the temperature of the air blown out. It does blow out quite a lot of air however.
customer_reviews.author: CammyChameleon

customer_reviews.title: What heat wave?
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this air conditioning unit before the mad summer heat wave. I wish I bought this early! Fantastic cool flow of air with the ease of using the remote control. Granted it's not completely silent but definitely worth buying!
customer_reviews.author: Chetan

customer_reviews.title: A very expensive fan. Not an effective air cooler.
customer_reviews.text: I returned this item as it was no better than a fan and too expensive to pay for a fan. It didn’t cool the air anywhere near as much as it advertises. I didn’t try the heater as it was very warm this summer.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN

customer_reviews.title: Generates cold air
customer_reviews.text: Compact and movable as it is on castors. I don’t feel l get a benefit from using the ice blocks, however it does have a range of options for speed etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An air cooler which is good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: The machine is very easy to use and provides a good cooling effect in a hot bedroom which is similar to an effective fan. It us, however, not an air conditioner. It is lightweight and easy to move.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Elliott

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Good product, so far not had to use the ice packs yet. Bit disappointed the moment i buy it a couple days later the price dropped by 12 pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a few fans in the room to try and cool it down but in the recent hotspell the fans ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for someone who had a few fans in the room to try and cool it down but in the recent hotspell the fans weren't making a difference. This has saved the day!! Easy to use, light and has really helped keep the room cool. Really good service and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. V. Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the room cool
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter who lives in Spain and she has reviewed it separately she loves it and has helped to keep her cool during the heatwave
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: Cooler home
customer_reviews.text: This is not and air conditioner but air cooler. Here in Finland this is quite enough :D Powerful, easy to use, easy to move around but a bit noisy. Still I rather have the noise than try to sleep in in hot sweaty bedroom - the few nights we have hot temperature here. It works as a fan or you can put water in the tank or just ice coolers packs.
customer_reviews.author: Marja

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars because like others have said
customer_reviews.text: 3 stars because like others have said, the fan is pretty good but I don't notice much of a cooling effect even with 5 ice packs inserts.
customer_reviews.author: MR NG LUNN

customer_reviews.title: Just a fan
customer_reviews.text: I guess I should have seen this coming. Looks good but was basically just a fan.air did not get any cooler, got a full refund
customer_reviews.author: Mr Influential

customer_reviews.title: Air cooler
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an air cooler for the hot summer months. I set it up and it meets my expectations.. At first I shall use it in my lounge but it can easily be moved anywhere in my house. It was reasonably priced
customer_reviews.author: Mrs E.Helen Codd

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me but good Company.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one to cool a very hot bedroom 30 degrees in the summer but found it not suitable. I had it beyond the normal return period but the Company agreed to its return and paid return postage so I would recommend them as a firm to buy from, I shall consider buying a Air Conditioner for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Terry H.

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a lovely slim unit, it fits perfectly in any room and doesnt take it over. In the recent hot weather this has been a godsend, its easily moved into a different room, easily set up AND you get 2 ice blocks with it - its so good I bought one for downstairs too!
customer_reviews.author: Kazza

customer_reviews.title: A great air-conditioning unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great room cooler. It's very light and easy to move around the home. I can't actually believe that you just add some water and wham bam you have cool air.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Easy to handle. arrived today even earlier than expected everything function as we hoped. high recommended for small apartments and rooms. Very Happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Honest review
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend this product.......it definitely earns a solid 4 star......it does cool you down when it's hot but only if you are sitting in front of it......putting cold water from fridge and ice into water compartment definitely improves the effectiveness haven't tried heater yet (obviously) but so far very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Daniela Smith

customer_reviews.title: This is an ice cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made product & easy to use but remember it’s an air cooler not an air conditioner ,it does cooling really well even better if you put the ice blocks in .
customer_reviews.author: Alan C Fox

customer_reviews.title: It’s not an a/c unit, does work as a cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler for personal use, didn’t really cool the room, ok if you’re in front of it, I rather expected it to be like an a/c unit, but it is what it is, a cooler.
customer_reviews.author: laurie

customer_reviews.title: I wouldnt buy any other Air cooler!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this Air cooler. My mum had one last year and i knew I was going to get one this year for the warm weather. The best £85 I have spent. I'll definitely be purchasing another one for the bedroom. Delivery was really quick, which was a bonus at the start of our hot weather.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Jones

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad cooler..
customer_reviews.text: Did the best it could to try and cool me down during the very hot weather. Glad I bought.
customer_reviews.author: gyprocjoe

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Slightly noisier than our fan, but did blow cold air rather than moving the hot air round.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs H Giles

customer_reviews.title: Just A fan - no more no less
customer_reviews.text: Make no mistake, this is a fan and a fan only. It's a good fan, don't get me wrong, lots of settings and having an ice pack may make a SLIGHT difference compared to normal fans, but any talk of 'air conditioning' or similar is simply not true unfortunately. If you want a fan get this, but anything more cooling you may need to shell out a bit more money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Sylv

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in this hot weather
customer_reviews.text: Excellent air cooler, adding ice makes a difference in this hot weather! So good we now have 3; one for each bedroom in our bed and breakfast. Our customers love them.
customer_reviews.author: Maxine Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great air cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit cautious after reading reviews on here but so happy I bought it anyway! It is easy to use and it cools out room very nicely! Super happy with this purchase~
customer_reviews.author: Malin E

customer_reviews.title: Glorified fan
customer_reviews.text: Honestly not what I was expecting.... still frying in my house at the moment .... construction though is sound and looks good
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase of the summer!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this for a few months now and I’ve reccomended it to so many people I thought I should write a review! As people have pointed out it’s not an aircon unit so it won’t cool a whole room, but it makes a huge difference in the heat. Even on the lowest setting it really cools you off. I use it with the humidifier on and no ice packs and it’s great.
customer_reviews.author: Chantal Wood

customer_reviews.title: Please don't buy unless you want just a basic fan.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read the reviews! It doesn't do anything a normal fan does except make alot more noise. The first 2 nights it seemed to be brilliant cooling the air a bit but mainly just adding moisture which was perfect, but now (1 week later) it's just a noisy fan that because of how low it sits just about covers your legs.
customer_reviews.author: Twigs

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the product, came very fast and is very powerful! The remote control is very helpful and has a big range! Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Addicted

customer_reviews.title: Cold
customer_reviews.text: Cool people who say it no good are not working it right
customer_reviews.author: xman

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I never write reviews but this is absolutely rubbish, it doesn’t produce enough cool air and when I tried contacting the seller they said I had to send it back and they will only refund 50% as it was open & you have to pay like £17 to return the item lol if you are looking for a reliable product and company this is not what you are looking for.
customer_reviews.author: ritzy

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it say it will do, very well - it is not an air conditioner
customer_reviews.text: close your doors and windows and after a few hours your room will be cooler than before you switched it on. Stand in front of it and you will have to turn it off, because you will be TOO cool - it really does cool the air it sucks in before it blows it out again.
customer_reviews.author: TJ Willetts

customer_reviews.title: great  product
customer_reviews.text: efficient and very quiet but needs frequent water top ups .
customer_reviews.author: Andrew S

customer_reviews.title: Not working
customer_reviews.text: Not working from the day I got it please can some come to pick up this order as its not working from day one i got it and i have been reporting this for long now Thanks Please reply Amazon
customer_reviews.author: suzanne Abachor

customer_reviews.title: Nice cool breeze
customer_reviews.text: This is not an air conditioner, if you want to cool down a whole room then this is not for you. If however you want somthing that wont just move hot air around then this is great, it only cools the air coming out of it, so if your not in its direction you wont be cooled. You need to use it with a lot of ice packs surrounded by water (because physics). Then sit in a nice cool air stream.
customer_reviews.author: AlexM

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: Very portable, cool air and nice. Instruction could better. Good air cooler
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Igenix IG9703 Air Cooler with LED Display 55 W - White by Igenix
product_meta.description: Three fan speed settings;7 hour timer setting and three wind mode;Big carry handle with remote control and castor wheels;6 L removable water tank;Comes with 2 year warranty which can be registered online
feature_bullets: Igenix IG9703 Air Cooler with LED Display 55 W - White
